channel.title: Updates on 4rkal's Dev Blog

item.title: New Domain
item.description: As part of the New Look, new start. I have decided to purchase this amazing domain (4rkal.com). As of today migration has been successful. All links should be redirecting to this domain.
item.content:encoded:
As part of the New Look, new start. I have decided to purchase this amazing domain (4rkal.com).

As of today migration has been successful. All links should be redirecting to this domain.

item.title: Hacktoberfest 2023
item.description: I am participating in hacktoberfest 2023 Got a tree planted in my name here
item.content:encoded:
I am participating in hacktoberfest 2023
